en-US: Do not send money to anywhere that is not listed here or on our official website. They are 100% PERCENT SCAMMERS. We are not responsible for any loss of funds. THIS IS SO IMPORTANT THAT WE EVEN BOLD, SCALED AND CAPITALIZED IT.
zh-CN: 请不要向这里或我们官方网站上未列出的位置发送任何资金。它们是 100% 的诈骗。我们无法对任何资金损失负责。这是如此重要，以至于我们甚至放大、加粗并大写它。
